product_name: Keen Westport Canvas Shoulder Bag - Women's
long_description: The women's Keen Westport Canvas Shoulder Bag is a great everyday size and shape for work, shopping or travel. Made of soft linen/cotton canvas, with a ticking-stripe lining. Single-zipper top opens easily for reaching contents. 2 drop-in end pockets can hold a water bottle, compact travel umbrella or phone. Adjustable nylon-webbing shoulder strap. Keen Westport Canvas Shoulder Bag has recycled aluminum components. Hidden front stash pocket; internal zippered organizer pocket; tethered key clip.
short_description: The women's Keen Westport Canvas Shoulder Bag is a great everyday size and shape for work, shopping or travel.
